header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Work, recent holidaying in Belgium, Belgium food and services, using SAT NAV, Belgium markets, Cycling, new mobile phone, tribulations of driving abroad. bile phone, tribulations of driving abroad.
header.activity: A daughter catching up with parents after their vacation abroad
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements
